Support Willie Through His Health and Hardship

The Full Story

ðŸš¨ The Crisis

My name is Willie, and I'm 58 years old. I lost my job on April 30, 2025, due to budget cuts after having special permission to work from home because of my Symptomatic chronic systolic heart failure and Trigeminal Neuralgia. I filed for disability benefits on May 14, but it's been months with no decision.

ðŸ’” Why We Need Help

I'm writing this because I need help to stay in my apartment. Because of my medical conditions, I can't travel far enough to find work, making temp jobs and retail impossible. My world is now confined to my apartment and the growing stack of bills.

ðŸ’° Where Money Goes

I need enough money to cover rent and the barest utilities until the SSA makes a decision on my disability claim. Sharing a few dollars, or even just this story, might keep the lights on for one more month.

âœ… Why Trust This

I'm not writing this for pity. I need help to stay in the apartment that has been my home, my office, my safe harbor, until SSA finally decides whether the rest of my life will be livable.
